channel.title: Overclocking on OzoneOC
channel.description: Recent content in Overclocking on OzoneOC

item.title: Memory Overclocking
item.description: Guides: # MemTestHelper DDR4 OC Guide # Stress Tests # TestMem5 # This is the best option for stressing DDR4 memory. Run and load the anta777 Extreme1 config, and make sure the application is running as admin for stressing memory. 3 cycles is good enough to test individual timings while tightening, but prefferably try to get to 9 at least for the final stress test. y-cruncher # Run application and select “Component Stress Tester” (option 1).
